metadata.title: CVE-2022-28390 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ems_usb_start_xmit in drivers/net/can/usb/ems_usb.c in the Linux kernelthrough 5.17.1 has a double free.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
